query:
SELECT r.id, r.orderNumber, r.status, p.firstNameHe, p.lastNameHe, p.additionalLuggage, p.singleRoomUpgrade 
FROM registrations r 
JOIN participants p ON r.id = p.registrationId 
WHERE r.orderNumber = 1021
command:
mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway03.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 3B86zBQzCDtZnPP.42020c08beca --database mDCqxtLbyjEfeXNALj3Bf7 --execute SELECT r.id, r.orderNumber, r.status, p.firstNameHe, p.lastNameHe, p.additionalLuggage, p.singleRoomUpgrade 
FROM registrations r 
JOIN participants p ON r.id = p.registrationId 
WHERE r.orderNumber = 1021
